hero.title: Environmental decree: strict control over construction and enterprises, artificial lakes, traffic restrictions

news.1: Saida Mirziyoyeva presented comprehensive proposals to improve the environmental situation in Tashkent...
news.2: Public hearings on the nuclear power plant construction project will be held in Jizzakh
news.3: Uzbekistan national team took a place in the third basket of the 2026 World Cup draw
news.4: The US has shortened the peace plan – and is now trying to convince Russia to accept it
news.5: 25-year-old crime, photo ban and Taliban ministers who went to India...
news.6: Neftchi became the champion of Uzbekistan after a 24-year break
news.7: Air-polluting enterprises were given a deadline: they must install monitoring stations...
news.8: An internal affairs officer and his minor daughter died from gas in Andijan

photos.1: Javohir Sindorov became the winner of the World Cup. In the final, he defeated China's representative Wei Yini and won...
photos.2: A special commission has been created in Tashkent to improve the environmental situation, with serious powers...

news.1: "Trucks are the reason there's no halva" – when will the disorder in the border village end?
news.2: "Everyone knows, but no one speaks" - Who filled the canal with foam in Buloqboshi?
news.3: "Can savagery reach this level?.." - bees are dying in the valley due to poisonous pesticide
news.4: Is there a guarantee that the incident like in "Medgorodok" won't happen again? Hot water pipe burst in Tashkent
news.5: Medicines in Uzbekistan are more expensive than in Kazakhstan – what factors affect the pharmaceutical market?
news.6: "Thought I would die" – In Tashkent, for the first time, they tried to rob with a knife to the neck

1.title: What is written in «Trump's Peace Plan»? All 28 points in Uzbek language
